text: Re-Sfaction is a remix album by DJ/producer Benny Benassi that was released in 2004. It showcases Benny Benassi's remixes of other artists work. ==Track listing== #Benassi Bros. featuring Sandy - "Illusion" (Sfaction Mix) – 5:23 #Sonique - "Alive" (Benny Benassi Sfaction Club Mix) – 5:31 #Benassi Bros. featuring Paul French - "Don't Touch Too Much" (Benny Smash Mix) – 5:32 #In- Grid - "In-Tango" (Benny Benassi Remix) – 5:07 #Ann Lee - "No no no " (Sfaction Mix) – 5:04 #Benny Benassi presents The Biz - "Able To Love" (Sfaction Radio Edit) – 3:29 #KMC featuring Sandy - "Get Better" (Sfaction Mix) – 5:17 #In-Grid - "Tu Es Foutu" (Benny Benassi Remix) – 5:00 #Electric Six - "Dance Commander" (Benny Benassi Remix) – 5:44 #Gambafreaks featuring Nicole - "Natural Woman " (Sfaction Mix) – 4:58 #Benassi Bros. featuring Violeta - "I Love My Sex" (Sfaction Mix) – 1:11 #Benny Benassi - "Satisfaction" (B.Deep Remix) – 6:29 #Benny Benassi presents The Biz - "Approved Bootleg Megamix" – 6:37 Category:Benny Benassi albums Category:2004 remix albums
title: Re-Sfaction
